summary: Recreate the JeetWin website with improved design, attractive color theme, hero section with multiple image banners, AI-generated images throughout, animations, and all links redirecting to WhatsApp.
architectural_notes: Reference site: https://jeet-win.live/ — clone content/structure with redesigned visuals
Use AI-generated images (Google Nano Banana Pro style) for hero banners and site visuals
All links (nav, CTA, game cards, promo, footer) open WhatsApp URL: https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

existing_features.title: Create a full-page layout that mirrors the structure of https://jeet-win.live/, including: top navigation bar with logo and login/register buttons, hero section, games/sports categories section, promotional banners section, featured games grid, footer with links and legal info.

Apply an attractive redesigned visual theme using a rich gold, deep black, and crimson red color palette with bold typography, glowing accents, and premium casino-style aesthetics. Enforce this theme consistently across all sections.

Build a full-width hero section at the top of the page featuring an auto-playing image carousel/slider with at least 5 banner slides. Each slide should display a promotional banner image, a headline, a subheadline, and a CTA button. Include previous/next navigation arrows and dot indicators.

Display a horizontal scrollable sports and games category tab bar below the hero section with icons and labels for categories such as: Cricket, Football, Casino, Slots, Live Casino, Card Games, Lottery. Clicking a tab filters the visible game/sport cards below.
Create a featured games/sports grid section displaying game cards. Each card should show a game banner image, game title, and a 'Play Now' button. Use the AI-generated images as card thumbnails.

Add a promotional offers/bonuses section with at least 3 offer cards. Each card should show a banner image, offer title (e.g., 'Welcome Bonus 200%', 'Refer a Friend', 'Daily Cashback'), a short description, and a 'Claim Now' button.
Render all AI-generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the hero slider, game cards, and promotional banners.

Implement a sticky top navigation bar with the JeetWin Pro logo on the left, navigation links (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About) in the center, and Login / Register buttons on the right. On mobile, collapse nav links into a hamburger menu.

Create a footer section with columns for: Quick Links, Games, Support (Contact Us, FAQ, Responsible Gaming), social media icons, and a legal disclaimer text. Use dark background with gold accent text.

Add entrance animations and micro-interactions throughout the entire website. This includes: fade-in/slide-up animations for sections as they enter the viewport (hero, stats bar, featured games, promotions, why choose us, footer), staggered card reveal animations for game cards and promo cards, hover scale/glow animations on all interactive cards and buttons, smooth transitions on the navigation bar, and animated text overlays in the hero carousel slides. Use CSS keyframes and/or Tailwind animation utilities consistently across all components.

Replace all link and button click handlers across the entire website so that every clickable element — including navigation links (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About), Login button, Register button, Play Now buttons on game cards, Claim Now buttons on promo cards, footer quick links, footer game links, footer support links, social media icons, hero carousel CTA buttons, and stats bar items — opens the WhatsApp URL 'https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!' in a new tab. No internal routing or anchor navigation should remain; every interactive link/button must redirect to this WhatsApp URL.

new_feature_requests.summary: Copy and redesign JeetWin website with attractive color theme and improved UI
Hero section with multiple image banners
Generate and integrate AI images throughout the website
All link clicks navigate to WhatsApp URL: https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
